meanings.definition: A game similar to ice hockey, played on ice with brooms instead of hockey sticks.
meanings.sent1: During the winter, we enjoy playing broomballs on the frozen pond.
meanings.sent2: The championship broomballs match was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally slipped on the ice while playing broomballs and ended up sweeping the snow instead.
meanings.sent4: The broomballs game was a fierce battle between the two teams, each trying to sweep the ball into the goal.
meanings.sent5: The sound of broomballs clashing echoed across the icy rink.

meanings.definition: The ball used in the game of broomball.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to pass the broomballs to your teammates to score a goal.
meanings.sent2: The broomballs rolled swiftly across the ice as players tried to control them with their brooms.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally kicked the broomballs into the snowbank instead of passing it to my teammate.
meanings.sent4: The shiny broomballs glistened under the arena lights, ready for the game to begin.
meanings.sent5: The referee blew the whistle, signaling the start of the match as the broomballs waited at the center of the rink.
